discourse_list.title: Suggestions on cooperation between uni and hop ~

content.content: It is hoped that uni can cooperate with hop to provide a certain number of uni tokens from the community Treasury for cross chain liquidity, and introduce uni tokens as assets into all L2;   hop mobility is that uni flows in different networks and can earn a certain service fee without any loss.   the hop cross chain protocol can better introduce uni tokens into more L2 networks and improve the usage scenarios of uni.   at present, matic, SNX and Frax all choose hop for cooperation. Through cooperation, uni holders can obtain certain benefits.
Thanks for the info I hope the same let’s just hope but u know how that goes they wont do anything  with out making there money
